pageProduct.name: OGX Extra Strength Hydrate + Repair Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo 385ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

Hair has a life of it's own and OGX wants to make sure it's a full life. Each innovative salon quality formula is made with on-trend ingredients to help hair shine, move, curl up, hold tight - whatever sets its personality free. The collections are fun and the choices never end.

In the world of haircare, no other brand has hair looking, smelling, and feeling like this. OGX is WHAT HAIR WANTS

General Information

OGX Argan Oil of Morocco Extra Strength Shampoo is intensely hydrating and helps locks in moisture to strengthen from within. The extra powerful hair strengthening shampoo will help repair dry, damaged and brittle hair preventing hair breakage.

OGX Hydrate & Repair Argan Oil of Morocco Extra Strength Shampoo 
Why You Want It... This potent sulfate free shampoo blend with argan oil of Morocco plus silk proteins helps to repair even the most severely dry, damaged strands, drenching them with hydration, and helping to strengthen from within. Discover soft, seductive, silky tresses.

Repair dry, damaged, brittle hair and minimise hair breakage. This argan oil shampoo has an extra powerful formula with silk proteins to help to intensely hydrate and lock in moisture to give hair a second chance at silky perfection.



  • Moisturising shampoo with Argan oil for dry damaged hair

  • Added silk proteins to help strengthen hair

  • Use for shiny, smooth hair that is stronger

  • Sulfate free sufactants, (sodium lauryl sulfate) SLS free

  • Not tested on animals

Size: 385 ml 13fl. oz.

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Hydrate & Repair
• Argan Oil of Morocco
• Extra Strength Shampoo


Warnings

Warning: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately. In case
of any discomfort, please discontinue and consult a physician. Keep out of reach
of children.

Ingredients

Ingredients: Water, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycol
Distearate, Citric Acid, Fragrance, Laureth-4, Polyquaternium-22, PEG-7 Amodimethicone,
Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Citrate, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Linoleamidopropyl
PG-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer,
Polyquaternium-39, PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, PPG-2 Hydroxyethyl
Cocamide, Silk Amino Acids, Sodium Hydroxide, CI 19140 , CI 17200 , Hexylene Glycol.

Directions

What You Do... Apply Shampoo generously to wet hair, massage into a lather
through to ends, then rinse the hair thoroughly. After shampooing, follow with
conditioner. For best results, use in conjunction with other OGX products.
